hero.description: A home is more than just shelter—it's a place of stability, privacy, and community. This initiative supports those creating their own homes in difficult circumstances by providing a platform for sharing designs.

guide.title: Building Better Homes
guide.description: We've designed this guide to help anyone create safer, more durable living spaces using accessible materials and techniques. Whether you're building your own shelter, helping others, or just exploring possibilities, we're here to support your journey.
guide.pathDescription: We've tailored resources for different needs. Select the option that best represents your situation.

essentials.title: Essentials & Materials
essentials.description: Discover what makes a shelter a home and explore useful materials you can find around you.

designs.title: Design Library
designs.description: Browse, select, and download design plans to create your own customized building guide.

contribute.title: Contribute Your Expertise
contribute.description: Share your knowledge, upload designs, or collaborate with our community to help others.

essentials.title: What does a home need?
essentials.description: Learn what makes a shelter into a home, from weather protection to finding and repurposing materials around you.

hero.title: Reimagining Home & Shelter
hero.subtitle: Not a House, but a Home – We believe in the power of self-built spaces to create stability and dignity. Our goal is to support, inspire, and empower people to build homes that truly feel like home.
hero.paragraph1: Housing is a fundamental right, yet many people are forced to create their own shelters outside traditional systems. This web application is a resource for those who build homes from found materials, as well as for advocates and architects working in solidarity with unhoused communities.
hero.paragraph2: A home is more than a shelter—it's a place of stability, privacy, and connection. Through design knowledge, creativity, and shared solutions, we support self-built housing as a pathway to dignity and security.
